segments.text: I visited the Polar Aquarium today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it like a zoo of polar animals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Almost . There are a lot of polar animals sea birds , such as seals , whales and penguins , People don't get much chance of seeing them .
